doc.title: Bitzitulebocques
doc.plot: Conventional ways of thought fragment and categorize our perception of the world: there is the living and there is the inanimate, there is the moving and there is the immovable. The world, however, is one indivisible entity, in which the so-called 'inanimate' objects live, move, communicate, suffer, just as we do. This is what in a witty, metaphorical and strikingly entertaining manner BITZITULEBOCQUES can prove in only one minute!
